name: OnLevelSelect_13A
_source: speak;Narrator;Jehanna, home of dancing white sands. This largely barren desert nation is infamous for its mercenary forces.

speak;Narrator;In accordance with her husband's dying wish, the beautiful Ismaire rules Jehanna.|The Queen of the White Dunes governs Jehanna with Grace and Honor.|When he was young, her son left Jehanna.|His whereabouts remain unknown.
speak;Narrator;After passing through Caer Pelyn, Eirika arrives in Jehanna.|There, she finds the nation embroiled in combat with Grado's forces.
